title: Axes
data:
{{version031}}
The '''Axes''' skill governs your character's mastery of all axes. These weapons deal only moderate damage, but their [[cleaving]] attacks damage multiple adjacent monsters. It [[crosstrain]]s with the [[Maces & Flails]] skill and the [[Polearms]] skill. 

{{skill_aptitudes}}

==History==
*Prior to [[0.14]], hand axes qualified as throwing weapons.
*Prior to [[0.12]], axes had higher base damage but lacked the cleaving effect, rendering them almost identical to [[Long Blades]].
